statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT age, patient_name FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age < 30 OR age > 70 ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients WHERE diagnosis <> 'Unknown' AND treatment_plan LIKE '%medication%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, record_id FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT m.patient_id, p.patient_name, m.date, m.diagnosis, m.doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords m JOIN Patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE m.date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.patient_name, m.date, m.diagnosis, m.treatment FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE p.age > 50 ORDER BY m.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_data WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT doctor_id, total_appointments, patient_satisfaction_rating FROM doctor_statistics ORDER BY patient_satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, diagnosis FROM telemedicine_appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT patient_id, appointment_id, appointment_date, diagnosis FROM telemedicine_appointments INNER JOIN patient_data ON telemedicine_appointments.patient_id = patient_data.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM telemedicine_appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctor_id, SUM(total_appointments) AS total_appointments FROM doctor_statistics GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING total_appointments > 50;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_data WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT doctor_id, patient_satisfaction_rating FROM doctor_statistics ORDER BY patient_satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM telemedicine_patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM telemedicine_patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM telemedicine_doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM telemedicine_appointments WHERE appointment_date='2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM telemedicine_patients JOIN telemedicine_records ON telemedicine_patients.patient_id = telemedicine_records.patient_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM telemedicine_patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM telemedicine_patients WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, record_date FROM telemedicine_patients JOIN telemedicine_records ON telemedicine_patients.patient_id = telemedicine_records.patient_id JOIN telemedicine_doctors ON telemedicine_records.doctor_id = telemedicine_doctors.doctor_id WHERE telemedicine_records.diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM telemedicine_patients ORDER BY address;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, practice_address FROM telemedicine_doctors ORDER BY specialization, doctor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_history GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(diagnosis) > 1;

SELECT * FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Neurology' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
